<Link id="l00460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="460"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="461"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="462"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We will require the use of X-Forms because the frame is larger than what</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="463"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// can be represented in signed 16 bits that fit in the immediate of a D-Form.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="464"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we need an X-Form then we need a register to store the address offset.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="465"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FrameSize = MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#a14c39a24bf6ebbe339ae8a453c7fdd11">getStackSize</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="466"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Signed 16 bits means that the FrameSize cannot be more than 15 bits.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="561"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineregisterinfo">MachineRegisterInfo</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a> = &amp;MF.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction/#a810234b6b3d223b7c74a4253fcc5ea5e">getRegInfo</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="562"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="563"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Call the base implementation first to set any hints based on the usual</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="564"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// heuristics and decide what the return value should be. We want to return</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="565"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the same value returned by the base implementation. If the base</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="566"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// implementation decides to return true and force the allocation then we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="567"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// will leave it as such. On the other hand if the base implementation</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="568"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// decides to return false the following code will not force the allocation</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="569"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// as we are just looking to provide a hint.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="570"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BaseImplRetVal = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetregisterinfo/#afc99d2835eb4b8cde9e81db9abca597c">TargetRegisterInfo::getRegAllocationHints</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="571"><span class="doxyHighlight">      VirtReg, Order, Hints, MF, VRM, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/liveregmatrix-cpp/#a8989acb71bd355e02bcf3a930b5e54ea">Matrix</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="572"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="573"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Don&#39;t use the allocation hints for ISAFuture.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="574"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The WACC registers used in ISAFuture are unlike the ACC registers on</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="575"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Power 10 and so this logic to register allocation hints does not apply.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="576"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MF.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction/#a3825368aca2bc1550d173660df4da6a6">getSubtarget</a>&lt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcsubtarget">PPCSubtarget</a>&gt;().isISAFuture())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="577"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BaseImplRetVal;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="578"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="579"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We are interested in instructions that copy values to ACC/UACC.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="580"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The copy into UACC will be simply a COPY to a subreg so we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="581"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// want to allocate the corresponding physical subreg for the source.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="582"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The copy into ACC will be a BUILD&#95;UACC so we want to allocate</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="583"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the same number UACC for the source.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="584"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetregisterclass">TargetRegisterClass</a> &#42;RegClass = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>-&gt;getRegClass(VirtReg);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="585"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a> : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>-&gt;reg&#95;nodbg&#95;instructions(VirtReg)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00942" /><CodeLine lineNumber="942"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// lowerCRSpilling - Generate the code for spilling a CR register. Instead of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00943" /><CodeLine lineNumber="943"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// reserving a whole register (R0), we scrounge for one here. This generates</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00944" /><CodeLine lineNumber="944"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// code like this:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00945" /><CodeLine lineNumber="945"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00946" /><CodeLine lineNumber="946"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   mfcr rA                  ; Move the conditional register into GPR rA.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00947" /><CodeLine lineNumber="947"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   rlwinm rA, rA, SB, 0, 31 ; Shift the bits left so they are in CR0&#39;s slot.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00948" /><CodeLine lineNumber="948"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   stw rA, FI               ; Store rA to the frame.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00949" /><CodeLine lineNumber="949"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00950" /><CodeLine lineNumber="950" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcregisterinfo/#a49453cd92df6e63d0c2c45e1d5ace04b"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcregisterinfo/#a49453cd92df6e63d0c2c45e1d5ace04b">PPCRegisterInfo::lowerCRSpilling</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a>,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00952" /><CodeLine lineNumber="952"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Get the instruction.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1074"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1095"><span class="doxyHighlight">    SpillsKnownBit = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1096"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1097"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">default</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1098"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// On Power10, we can use SETNBC to spill all CR bits. SETNBC will set all</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1099"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bits (specifically, it produces a -1 if the CR bit is set). Ultimately,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1100"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the bit that is of importance to us is bit 32 (bit 0 of a 32-bit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1101"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// register), and SETNBC will set this.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1102"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Subtarget.isISA3&#95;1()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1560"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1561"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Return the OffsetOperandNo given the FIOperandNum (and the instruction).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1562" lineLink="#a700ef849e7af4576b5355d0505cc694c"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a700ef849e7af4576b5355d0505cc694c">getOffsetONFromFION</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1564"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Take into account whether it&#39;s an add or mem instruction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1565"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> OffsetOperandNo = (FIOperandNum == 2) ? 1 : 2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1566"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.isInlineAsm())</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01702" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1702"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this is a PPC64 &quot;ix&quot; instruction, only a 16-bit value with the low two bits</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1708"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: This should be factored out to a separate function as prefixed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1709"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instructions add a number of opcodes for which we can use 34-bit imm.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1710"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> OffsetFitsMnemonic = (OpC == PPC::EVSTDD || OpC == PPC::EVLDD) ?</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1731"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ScavengingFailed = RS &amp;&amp; RS-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regscavenger/#afaf92711851d9d2abd2ef7f6c1b68bf8">getRegsAvailable</a>(RC).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector/#aa19094c99ca405ec1efe38da727d27de">none</a>() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1734"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1735"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The register scavenger is unable to get a GPR but can get a VSR. We</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01736" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1736"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// need to stash a GPR into a VSR so that we can free one up.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01737" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1737"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ScavengingFailed &amp;&amp; Subtarget.hasDirectMove()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01738" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1738"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Pick a volatile register and if we are spilling/restoring that</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01854" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1854"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// It&#39;s the load/store FI references that cause issues, as it can be difficult</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01855" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1855"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to materialize the offset if it won&#39;t fit in the literal field. Estimate</span></CodeLine>
